overview: MOE grew up in strict traditions. WAY is rebellious and free-spirited, born with defected heart, shutting everyone off around her so that she can die anonymously. They meet at the hospital when MOE is diagnosed with cancer. Although outwardly calm, MOE is scared of impending death, finding solace in a carefree Way. This odd pair are drawn to each other.
title: What Happened to the Wolf?
